column2: "Nna Israel mpanyimfo no bi baa me nkyɛn na wɔtsenatsenaa m’enyim."
"Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ;"

column2: "Onyimpa ba
column3: mbarimba yi wɔdze hɔn abosom esuma hɔn akoma mu
column4: na wɔdze hɔn emumuyɛ ne fintsidua esi hɔn enyim: aso ɔsɛ dɛ wɔba mo hɔ ebisa?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi kasa kyerɛ hɔn na se hɔn dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Israel fi mu ɔbarimba biara a ɔdze n’abosom bosuma n’akoma mu
column4: na ɔdze n’emumuyɛ ho fintsidua esi n’enyim
column5: na ɔaba nkɔnhyɛnyi hɔ no; emi EWURADZE mubobua no wɔ mu dɛ mbrɛ n’abosom dodow tse;"

column2: "ama meesuo Israelmba mu wɔ hɔnara hɔn akoma mu
column3: osiandɛ wɔnam hɔn abosom do atsew hɔnho efi me nkyɛn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi se Israelmba dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hom nsan
column4: na hom ndan hom ho mfi hom abosom ho; na hom ndan hom enyi mfi hom ekyiwadze nyinara ho."

column2: "Na Israelmba anaa ahɔho a wɔakɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ Israel no mu obiara a ɔbɛtsew noho efi me nkyɛn na ɔdze n’abosom esuma n’akoma mu
column3: na ɔdze n’emumuyɛ ho fintsidua esi n’enyi do
column4: na ɔaba nkɔnhyɛnyi hɔ ebebisa mo hɔ adze no; emi EWURADZE mara na mubobua no:"

column2: "na medze m’enyi bɛsa nyimpa no
column3: na mayɛ no ahobowdze ma ɔaayɛ asɛnkyerɛdze na kasabɛbu na mubotwa no efi me man mu akyen; na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na sɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi bi wɔdaadaa no ma ɔka asɛm bi a
column3: emi EWURADZE na madaadaa nkɔnhyɛnyi no
column4: na mebɛtsen me nsa wɔ no do
column5: na masɛɛ no efi me man Israel mu."

column2: "Na wɔbɔsoa hɔn emumuyɛ: nkɔnhyɛnyi n’emumuyɛ bɛyɛ dɛ nyia ɔba no hɔ no n’emumuyɛ no ara;"
"amma Israelmba aanntɔ gon emmfi me nkyɛn bio
column3: eso wɔaammfa hɔn mbrato eenngu hɔnho fi bio; na mbom ama wɔaayɛ me man na emi so maayɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column6: sɛ asaase bi dze mbrato yɛ me bɔn
column7: na metsen me nsa wɔ no do

column2: "kaansa mbarimba baasa yi
column3: Noa
column7: hɔnara hɔn akra ara na wɔnam hɔn tsenenee do bɛgye

column2: "Sɛ mema mbowa bɔn kyin asaase no do
column3: na wɔsɛɛ no
column5: ma biara nndua do wɔ mbowa ntsi a:"

column2: "kaansa mbarimba baasa yi wɔ mu a
column3: dɛ metse ase yi
column5: wɔrenngye mbabanyin anaa mbabaa; hɔnara nko na wɔbɛgye hɔn

column2: "Anaaso sɛ medze afona ba asaase no do
column3: na mese dɛ
column5: fa asaase no do ɛ; ma muntwa nyimpa na abowa fi do nkyen;"

column2: "kaansa mbarimba baasa yi wɔ hɔ mpo a
column3: dɛ metse ase yi
column6: na hɔnara nko na wɔbɛgye hɔn."

column2: "Anaaso sɛ mosoma yardɔm ba asaase no do
column3: na muhue m’ebufuhyew gu do wɔ bɔgya mu
column4: dɛ murutwa nyimpa na abowa mefi do a:"

column2: "kaansa Noa
column3: Daniel
column4: na Job wɔ hɔ mpo a
column7: wɔrenngye babanyin anaa babaa; hɔnara hɔn akra ara na wɔnam hɔn tsenenee do bɛgye."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Na akantam dɛ mobɔsoma m’atsɛmbudze yerɛyerɛw anan
column3: afona
column6: na yardɔm maba Jerusalɛm do eebotwa nyimpa na abowa efi mu?"

column2: "Naaso
column3: hwɛ
column4: wobegyaa nkaase bi wɔ mu a wɔdze hɔn befir edzi akɔ
column7: na hom ehu hɔn abrabɔ na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ: na wɔbɛkyekye hom werɛ wɔ mbusu a medze aba Jerusalɛm do no ho
column8: dza medze aba do nyinara no ho a."

column2: "Na wɔbɛkyekye hom werɛ
column3: ber a hom bohu hɔn abrabɔ na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ no: nna hom bohu dɛ dza mayɛ no wɔ mu nyinara nnyɛ kwa ara na mayɛ
